items.title: Google Spreadsheet ID
items.description: The ID or URL of a publicly shared Google spreadsheet.

items.title: Sheet Name
items.description: The name of the sheet to import.

items.title: Missing Values
items.description: A comma separated list of double-quoted strings to be considered as missing. Example: "NONE","INFINITY","999"

items.title: Skip
items.description: Number of lines to skip before reading data.

items.title: Identifier Column Name
items.description: Name of the column containing the IDs

items.title: Entity Type
items.description: Specify what these data relate to (Participant, Instrument, Area etc.)
